Obviously, I'd advice to make sure you have at least some form of gender dysphoria prior to taking hormones, because you can actually give yourself gender dysphoria like that and end up regretting your experience. I also think that your hormone profile doesn't have to determine your gender at all, and you can totally remain a boy while taking estrogen because you want to feminize yourself, without renouncing to your gender identity. I wish experimenting with your body and your identity were more accepted.
